titleStmt.title: The second part of the Parallele, or conference of the ciuill law, the canon law, and the common law of this realme of England Wherein the agreement and disagreement of these three lawes touching diuers matters not before conferred, is at large debated and discussed. Whereunto is annexed a table ... Handled in seauen dialogues, by William Fulbecke.
Parallele or conference of the civill law, the canon law, and the common law of this realme of England. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Fulbeck, William, 1560-1603?
